subject: Urgent: API integration not working after update
body:
Hi Support,

I'm frustrated because our API integration stopped working after your latest update. We're getting 500 errors on all webhook callbacks since yesterday morning. This is blocking our entire sales pipeline.

We're on the Enterprise plan and this is unacceptable for a production system. Can someone look into this immediately?

Our API key is configured correctly and was working fine before the update.

Thanks,
John Smith
CTO, Acme Corp
